underlying_goal: Fix a filtering bug in reflect_all_menus() where orphan items from other sessions were being processed, causing 0% success rate, by adding search_menu() filtering at the start of the function
brief_summary: User asked to implement a filtering fix in reflect_all_menus() to exclude orphan items, Claude successfully edited the code, added input validation per Codex review, updated skills/memory docs, and restarted the server; user then requested a full STEP 1-8 test which was being planned when the session ended.
